description: Tests enhanced URL detection that catches links without http/https prefix, including bank impersonation domains and suspicious patterns like 'sbi-bank.pay.in'.

turns.scammer_message: Urgent! Your SBI account requires verification. Click here: sbi-bank.pay.in/xY7834 to update KYC immediately.
turns.notes: Should detect URL without http/https prefix. Domain has hyphens and suspicious 'pay.in' pattern.

turns.scammer_message: Alternative link if not working: hdfc-verify.secure.co.in/update123 or bit.ly/hdfc-kyc
turns.notes: Multiple URLs without protocol. URL shortener and multi-level subdomain.

turns.scammer_message: You can also use official link: https://bank-secure.co/form/verify or icici-update.verify.in/abc
turns.notes: Mix of URLs with and without protocol. Should catch all suspicious patterns.

turns.scammer_message: For payment issues visit: paytm-refund.claim.in/get-refund or aadhaar-update.gov-portal.in/verify
turns.notes: URLs with suspicious keywords 'refund', 'claim', 'gov-portal' should be flagged.

turns.scammer_message: Final reminder link: tinyurl.com/bank-verify or cutt.ly/verify-now. Act fast!
turns.notes: URL shorteners should be detected and marked suspicious.
